snippet: Dozens of news and opinion Web sites will offer live coverage on election night, some with TV-like newscasts and others with live blogs.  The Media Decoder staff looks at the coverage.
abstract: Dozens of news and opinion Web sites will offer live coverage on election night, some with TV-like newscasts and others with live blogs.  The Media Decoder staff looks at the coverage.

headline.main: Election Night: Live-Blogging the Media Coverage
